title: Cabinet approves new pay scale for constitutional positions (Bangladesh Awami League)
text: ( Source : Bangladesh Awami League ) Published on Monday, 19 October 2015 10:50 Hits: 10 Keeping consistency with the new pay scale for civil servants, the cabinet today approved proposals for enhancement of remuneration and privileges of the
